content: new round continue knitting to make sure all picked up sts from both sides of heel flaps and heel sts are on the same needle the other needle should only hold the instep stiches work one round in stockinette sts on needle1 and follow chart a on needle2 gusset decrease needle1 picked up sts from both sides and heel turn sts needle2 instep sts = chart a rnd1 k until 3 sts left on needle1 k2tog k1 k chart a on needle2 go back to needle1 k1 ssk k to the beginning rnd2 k the rest sts on needle1 and k chart a on needle2 repeat rnd1 and 2 which means one round of decrease and one round of plain stiches until you get original sts on both needle1 and 2 which are 30/32sts foot length continue knitting until the foot of the sock reaches the end where your big toe starts separating of your big toe for the size i offer here you can knit about 18cm/7 ⅕ inches and 20cm/8inches before you start deceasing for toes the foot length is very easy to adjust you can knit as long as you need 5 toe decrease continue working on 2 needles on needle1 and needle2 work in the same way as follows k1 ssk k to 3 stitches before the end k2tog k1 repeat this until you only have 12/14 sts on each needle kitchener bind off with your tapestry needle close the toe using the kitchener stitch weave in ends soak and block if desired there are traditional kitchener stitch which may result in dog ears at the corners here i recommend to follow the tutorial from this one to finish the bind off https //www youtube com/watch v=efhxnvfmobe&t=5s abbreviations co cast on sts stitches dpn double pointed needle k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together as one decrease yo yarn over rs right side ws wrong side s2kp slip 2sts knitwise at the same time k1 and pass slipped stitch over ssk slip1 slip 1 pass slipped stitch over 6 thank you for your interest in my pattern feel free to tag me on instagram @annaluciadu i would love to see your finished work too 7
